Binary: webcamoid, libavkys8, libavkys-dev, webcamoid-plugins, akqml, webcamoid-data
Build-Depends: debhelper (>= 11), libasound2-dev, libavcodec-dev (>= 4.0), libavdevice-dev (>= 4.0), libavformat-dev (>= 4.0), libavutil-dev (>= 4.0), libgl1-mesa-dev, libgstreamer-plugins-base1.0-dev, libjack-dev, libpulse-dev, libqt5opengl5-dev, libqt5svg5-dev, libswresample-dev, libswscale-dev, libv4l-dev, linux-libc-dev, pkg-config, qtdeclarative5-dev, qtmultimedia5-dev, qtquickcontrols2-5-dev, qttools5-dev-tools
Package-List: akqml deb video optional arch=linux-any libavkys-dev deb libdevel optional arch=linux-any libavkys8 deb libs optional arch=linux-any webcamoid deb video optional arch=linux-any webcamoid-data deb video optional arch=all webcamoid-plugins deb video optional arch=linux-any
